text: Basse-Allaine is a municipality in Porrentruy in the Swiss canton of Jura. On 1 January 2009, the former municipalities of Buix, Courtema√Æche and Montignez merged into the new municipality of Basse-Allaine. The name refers to the Allaine River which runs through the municipality. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Municipalities in Porrentruy Category:2009 establishments in Switzerland
title: Basse-Allaine
